tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TortureReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR,
  perpetrator_name VARCHAR,
  victim_name VARCHAR,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TortureAnalytics (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES TortureReports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Incident (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 location VARCHAR,
 date DATE,
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Perpetrator (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR,
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Victim (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR,
 age INT,
 nationality VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE VictimDetails (
  victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  victim_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE Perpetrators (
  perpetrator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  perpetrator_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  affiliation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  severity VARCHAR(20),
  risk_rating VARCHAR(10),
  prevention_strategy TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TortureReports (
 report_id BIGINT,
 report_date DATE,
 victim_name VARCHAR(255),
 perpetrator_name VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE VictimDetails (
 victim_id BIGINT,
 victim_name VARCHAR(255),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 nationality VARCHAR(50),
 medical_report TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PerpetratorDetails (
 perpetrator_id BIGINT,
 perpetrator_name VARCHAR(255),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 affiliation VARCHAR(50),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentLocation (
 location_id BIGINT,
 location_name VARCHAR(255),
 city VARCHAR(50),
 countr...ment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PreventionStrategies (
 strategy_id BIGINT,
 strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT,
 impact_analysis TEXT,
 effectiveness_rating INT
)
